pr_title: Adding Hit counts and Miss counts for QueryCache exposed through REST api. This resolves:#48645

timeline.message: Adding Hit counts and Miss counts for QueryCache exposed through REST api

Adding Hit counts and Miss counts for QueryCache exposed through REST api

timeline.bodyText: Our internal style guide limits lines to 140 characters and we prefer to use that full width whenever possible. Only the line for the query_cache.miss_count stat exceeds 140 characters, so the lines for the other stats should not need line breaks in them.
timeline.author: danhermann
